channel.title: Gr.11 physics help need only 2 questions
channel.description:
i ned answer for these two question and how to do it (if its faster to put the answer just post it first please and thank you)
1. A car travelling along a highway must uniformly reduce its speed to 12m/s in 3.0 seconds. it travels 60m during that time.
i. what is the cars average acceleration? ii. what is its initial velocity
2. a Ferrari moving at 100km/h is 80km behind a Jaguar moving in the same direction at 60km/h. how far does the ferrari travel before it catches up with the jaguar?
can you help me find a soultion to these it be great thank you very much

item.title: Gr.11 physics help need only 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:4, topic:147016”]Sorry I know that, find some other to flame please.
Or post the right answer since you mean I have done something wrong.[/quote]

Learn the definition of flame please.

…[/quote]
